amendment.description: To clarify the use of funding under the National Fire Plan.

vote.text: Amendment SA 156 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 156 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Domenici. (consideration: CR S1427-1429) To clarify the use of funding under the National Fire Plan.

Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 156 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Domenici.
